class.name: AttributeOperation
class.description: It represents an operation to be applied to an attribute value.

method.name: add
method.description: Adds a value to the attribute.

method.name: divide
method.description: Divides the attribute by a value.

method.name: multiply
method.description: Multiplies the attribute by a value.

method.name: operate
method.description: Applies the operation to the base value.

method.name: percentage
method.description: Applies a percentage to the attribute.

method.name: subtract
method.description: Subtracts a value from the attribute.
